problem:
VoVi = " R/(L*j*w + R) " LPF = " LPF " HPF = " HPF " Neither = " Neither "
The following circuit is one more combination of an inductor and a resistor driven by a voltage source in a series circuit.
In the space provided below write an algebraic expression for the complex voltage-transfer ratio \(\frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}}\). (Remember, write \(w\) for \(\omega\).)
What kind of response is this? In the space provided below enter one of the strings: \({\rm LPF}\), \({\rm HPF}\), or \({\rm Neither}\).
